website_summaries.verdict: Rich, long-wearing body paint that's ideal for costuming and stage wear, but you'll have to purchase several tubes if you want a variety of colors.
pros: Has a creamy consistency that applies smoothly into the skin
Capable of providing full coverage to large areas
Comes in a variety of shades
cons: You only get one tube for the price, so it could get expensive if you need a collection of colors
Some shades are more pigmented than others

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making me a troll princess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff for my Halloween costume - Fiona from Shrek. Everyone was amazed with how great it looked. It went on easily with just fingertips, a thin coat gave a great color result, stayed in place all day, and came off with just soap and water. Perfect for my need and would buy again in other colors as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this stuff! I used it for my Halloween makeup, picture posted! Looked great, and went on a pure black color, with a creamy consistency. It did crack a little, which required touch ups throughout the night. No big deal though. Still looked good!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyB

customer_reviews.title: Shrek in a tube!
customer_reviews.text: I bough so, so many tubes of this color for Shrek the Musical. It covers well, blends well, and lasts the whole show. The person playing Shrek would get very sweaty, and this paint held up with only minor touch-ups during intermission. I even thinned it down with airbrush medium in order to spray it on. It worked out great both sponged on and sprayed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Householder

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't like other Mehron products I've used
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this could be a full coverage body paint ( For my face and neck) but it barley covered my skin. I have tan skin and i usually use Mehron body paints for my cosplays. I wanted to give the cream based paint a try because i've heard from other cosplayers that its full coverage but it looked like an ashy cream on my face. I think i'll just stick to their other products than the cream based ones
customer_reviews.author: Cian

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually have very sensitive skin and any oil based face paint makes my skin look like a teenage skin for a week or so. I really like this paint. No rashes, no irritations. It is easy to mix colors and it applies smoothly. As it is water based it is subject to smearing if you sweat a lot. I use the fixing spray and this really solves that problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: rueblig

customer_reviews.title: Good Halloween Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is a light green color for my Halloween costume for myself. I also bought it in white for my husband's costume. Makeup covered well, dried fast, and looked just as I needed it to! It lasted all night on both of us with minimal drying out and next to no smudging. I would definitely buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom3

customer_reviews.title: Flaky but good quality for at least an hour
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my toddlers Tin Man costume. It’s thick enough to not look cheap, but it begins to flake off after about an hour. It did not break her skin out and decently easy to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: RangersWife16

customer_reviews.title: the product felt really nice going on and I couldn't feel it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have stupidly sensitive skin-- but this product didn't cause any irritation at all. In fact, the product felt really nice going on and I couldn't feel it on my skin for the entire night (6+ hours). It was easy to wash off and I didn't experience any breakouts after use. The product is decidedly opaque-- you don't really need to build up for full coverage. It works as a fantastic base for conventional make-up (blush/eye shadow/ etc). My eye shadow stayed put! I purchased both white and grey (to do a light grey skin). Mixing two parts white to one part gray left me with a blueish tint. ?? :-/
customer_reviews.author: This Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product. I do full-on Halloween makeup every year and wanted to try this product since a lot of people rave about it. Tried it on fair and medium skin complexion and it was a nightmare! Tried applying with makeup brush, sponge, finger tips and nothing seemed to do the trick, just makes you look like your skin is bumpy and that you have bad skin. Good thing I had snazaroo laying around, 3 hours wasted when I easily applied snazaroo for just 30 minutes. Surprised people use this product for places like con. 1 star for the makeup setting spray
customer_reviews.author: suvicha

customer_reviews.title: Not for blending
customer_reviews.text: The product would go on smooth but then it got super tacky almost instantly which made it impossible to blend. I used a sponge, brush, and fingers, as well as applied on a clean face, over moisturizer, and over primer. Nothing worked. This would be a good paint to use for a camo/Rambo look, but definitely not for blending like a foundation. I would return but it is not eligible.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Comes off easy
customer_reviews.text: This product was very dark, went on easy and came off super easy. You just need water and a little soap and it comes right off. The problem was that when I started to sweat and wiped my forehead, a little of it came off. I have very sensitive skin and it was great for me. Stuff usually gives me a rash or gives me a red face after I wash it off. This product did none of those. I do recommend this product as long as it’s not for the summer outside. Too hot
customer_reviews.author: Shari Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: Easy application & staying power
customer_reviews.text: Went to a Halloween party dressed as Goldenface. I threw this on (with my fingers, no sponge) in a dark car parked under a street light before the party. Had it on for a couple hours in the Florida heat and humidity, didn't crack or smear off. I did leave behind traces of gold on other people's costumes from hugging them all, but it didn't hurt the look of the face paint. I also have very sensitive and breakout-prone skin, and days later I haven't broken out in a single pimple or hive! 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shaye & Family

customer_reviews.title: More of a ghostly look, not clown thankfully
customer_reviews.text: I just received this order, so my opinion may change. I tried this on my hand, and it's not as opaque as I thought it would be, but didn't really want "clown" white (shudder-clowns😣) so it will probably work out ok for my Halloween makeup. Just at the experimental phase, so we'll see. I'll post updates/pictures in the future. So far, I will probably order other colors so I don't use up all my shadows on this.
customer_reviews.author: Crazygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and not eligible for returns
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a couple weeks before Halloween to use as part of a Gamora costume. Simply put, I ended up going as a non-green Gamora. This product was awful - super thick consistency and did not cover evenly AT ALL. Horrible. I tried three different applications, making sure to wash my face thoroughly between applications. No luck. I even attempted to use it to tint regular face moisturizer hoping it would thin it out and spread better. Again, no luck. Worst part? **NO RETURN POLICY** So that was literally money down the drain. VERY UNHAPPY CUSTOMER!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: So hard to get off!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this while he streams. It is very pigmented it gets a 9/10 for that. However, I cannot for the life of me get this out of my dang towels!!! It has ruined about 5 now and resulted in me throwing it away. He has tried my makeup remover, tissue, dry towels, wet towels, baby wipes, just face wash and water.... this is hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Kioni Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Great for Day Of The Dead Makeup
customer_reviews.text: This worked awesome for my Day of the Dead Makeup I did for Halloween. Lasted all night. I wore it for about 8 hours but it could have outlasted me. I had to use makeup remover to get it off but I think that’s a good thing vs it coming off with just soap and water. It is more gray/green white than pure white. I started using a makeup sponge but was not getting as darker/thick of a color that I wanted so I ended up using a foundation brush. Didn’t take too long to dry enough to add the rest of my design to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylon Franks

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT be disappointed, great body/face paint!
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR the best Halloween makeup I've ever used! It covers great! I used 3 layered colors. I put down my main color, sprayed a little barrier spray to help the drying process, put my other two colors on top and sprayed again. No smearing, none rubbed off. For clean up, just soap and water, no scrubbing, no irritation, no mess, and no pigment left behind. It was a great. I've always used the stuff they sell at the Halloween store... Never again! This stuff is worth every penny... period!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this like the plague
customer_reviews.text: Seriously even as a professional makeup artist there was nothing i could do to make this work. It smelled gross, made a sticky, slimy, gooey, crackling mess. It is also so sheer. If you go over the same area with beauty blender or any other tools it will pick it up and create horrible patches that cant be smoothed over. Even if you manage to get a somewhat nice spot, covering with lots of powder and setting spray does nothing to help it stay. I put a few tiny drops of water near it to replicate sweat and it instantly came off. Absolutely garbage.
customer_reviews.author: color woods

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Is Incredible
customer_reviews.text: To preface; I've worked many professional haunted attractions in my day. I wish we had access to this stuff! Purchased for Dia de Muertos makeup for my family of four. INCREDIBLE coverage, easy application, and spectacular durability. I applied early morning; my sweaty husband and two very young children only required one touch up around the mouth before the afternoon's festivities, my own makeup lasted far into the night without any assistance. I was afraid the size of the product wouldn't be enough, but we barely used even a quarter of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nery

customer_reviews.title: Cracky finish, burns skin
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get this to go on smooth like other mehron products. It also is not blendable if you are trying to put it next to another color. A lot goes a little way if you want it to look smooth without cracks. It also feels fiery on my skin, like a sun burn. I’ll probably use this for small details instead of the main concept like I was planning. Wouldn’t buy again!
customer_reviews.author: MitchMillett

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The product applied very patchy and does not layer well. I used professional sponges and brushes to try and get this product to apply smoothly, but it ended up incredibly streaky. Trying to layer over didn't work either, and usually ended up removing or smudging the layer below. It also felt so cakey once it dried, unlike any other product I've used before. I ended up just wiping it all off and just scrapping the entire face design. I would not recommend this product. Generally Mehron products are great, but this is a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Middle school theater
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our middle school production of ShrekJr. The coverage was good, applied nice with both sponge and fingers. A little went a long way. After covering one students face, part of his neck, hands and forearm, we still didn’t use more than half the tube even with two performances worth of makeup. He reported it felt great on, and that he barely felt it on his skin. It was long lasting but washed off well with simple soap and water. Didn’t seem to rub off, and stayed put even with the heavy sweating of middle schoolers!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre  Quality compared to other mehron products
customer_reviews.text: I have used Mehron makeup in the past and had very good luck with it staying on. (I used powder/mixing liquid in the past and was in awe at how well it went on, looked, and stayed on) This cream version did not allow me to layer makeup or add lines because it smeared/wiped off so easily. :-( . and even a drop of liquid say from a drink caused very bad streaking/running of the makeup. Also, I ordered ogre green and I will say it was quite yellow tinted and stained my skin yellow (not terribly, but noticeable even after showering)
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for Halloween and specifically because it listed that it was a cream face makeup (I have dry skin). I put it all over my face for Halloween and about 2 hours later the white makeup had dried out so much it was literally flaking off my face onto my black costume. I had made a point of moisturizing my face before applying makeup. I was not happy, do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauretta Avina

customer_reviews.title: Ogre green perfext shrek
customer_reviews.text: Wore ogre green for shrek for Halloween; it is perfectly matched the shrek ears I had ordered. Covers well, wasn’t super easy to remove but eventually washed off after a few times. Stained one really light piece of recently highlighted hair near my face. Still a tiny greenish yellow streak in 4 months later lol. But nevertheless I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I remember reading it's used professionally, but I highly doubt that! I made the mistake of not reading any reviews. It doesn't cover well, no matter what I used, big make-up blender, sponge, brush, my hands. It never covered evenly. The only good thing about it is it washed off easily. I purchased the black and the red ones also. They all came in separate deliveries as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Item didn't have very detailed instructions. It went on cakey and didn't have great coverage until you let it completely dry they reapply another layer. Very time consuming. If you tried to put more on before it was dry you had spots where it would come off. Very frustrating. It went on green but ended up looking yellow after about an hour and in my pictures I was yellow. I was supposed to be Fiona. I gave it 3 stars because I have very sensitive skin and it didn't give me a reaction. It's not the best but it definitely is not the worst. I may have done some things wrong as I am not a pro makeup person.
customer_reviews.author: Delila M Kappo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Halloween on my son. It works really well and I didn't need to apply more than one layer. I did use a setting powder after which helped and I recommend if applying to a large area. Good price, good product.
customer_reviews.author: CocoBrielle

customer_reviews.title: Already opened..
customer_reviews.text: It came already ripped opened and wrapped in a plastic bag in the package. I found this very odd because the black and white paint I ordered with it was still in tacked. With that being said, the paint is buildable, and lasts relatively long. Just powder it down with some translucent powder or a little bit of baby powder if you don't have a green, and you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Uneven application
customer_reviews.text: I tried the product to confirm whether I can use it for my Halloween makeup. I applied it with a sponge, and the paint did not spread evenly. It looked patchy on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I am definitely ordering more for Halloween this year! I ordered this to turn my face green like the Wicked Witch. I had a themed school function and I was dressing like the wicked witch. This makeup lasted over 6 hours... It was not itchy at all, I kept forgetting I even had any makeup on my face!! I would absolutely recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Activate with light to glow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on my son for Halloween and as you can see in the pics, it worked pretty well. People who said it doesn't work probably didn't put it under light first. After I applied it to him, I took a flashlight and shined it on the makeup for about a minute. It glowed really well but it didn't last very long. Maybe if I kept the light on it longer, it would have lasted longer but he was in a hurry to go out, so I'm not sure. For the price it was worth it, even if just for the good pics.
customer_reviews.author: CocoBrielle

customer_reviews.title: Chips badly.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but it chips like crazy. I used it on my face and used fake blood on my neck. Little specks of the white paint are chipping and sticking to the blood on my neck making it look bad. It's very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: abigaile

customer_reviews.title: Nope, nope, nope
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing the Glow In The Dark Mehron Makeup. Quite simply: this product did not glow in the dark, no matter what. I applied as directed, then applied more... then applied more. I had an extraordinary amount of this applied to my face before I gave up. Additionally, I have sensitive skin and this makeup has a very unpleasant "burn" after just a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Girl

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for helping me catfish
customer_reviews.text: Catfished men and terrified children dressed as the woman, the myth, the legend, The wicked witch of the west. I had a pretty epic asthma attack at this Halloween party I volunteered at. When I was taken to the ER I was mistaken for The Incredible Hulk. Not what I was going for but that’s ok. Would highly recommend this makeup if you want to attract men or women who are attracted to shrek, the hulk or the wicked witch of the west. GOOD LUCK
customer_reviews.author: Cosmicowl

customer_reviews.title: Not for amateurs
customer_reviews.text: I just could not get this stuff to work. Was already running late for a halloween party and had to send me husband out last minute for something else. He got lucky and got recommended something by someone at the pharmacy that IMO, is far superior- Wet n Wild paint pot. That product was the smooth texture, easy to put on and stayed put as I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: busybee123

customer_reviews.title: LONG LASTING!
customer_reviews.text: Man this stuff is Hardcore. Water Based? I think not. It took me 2 showers to really get it off my skin, clothes, hair, from under my nails. If you want something that will last you through the night. This is it! And it doesn’t take much, the opacity is great. This is not a bad product, it is a long lasting one
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, during our production of Wizard of Oz at ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, during our production of Wizard of Oz at the theatre. Although, does not give as many applications as the bottle indicated had to buy to more to make it through all of the productions.
customer_reviews.author: daddis

customer_reviews.title: Hated it! Should have returned
customer_reviews.text: This makeup dries too fast. It was impossible to cover the whole face before it dried. Then when I put more on that was wet it would not blend into the dry areas. Instead it would just remove the dried area. Looked very patchy. I ended up going with a white foundation that worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Do the research and buy a better quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought if I applied this stuff evenly and in light layers it would be able to dry correctly and look fine. It was a waste of time and money. Not complaining about the cost, because it is inexpensive. However do the research and find a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Comes off easily, a little too easily
customer_reviews.text: Comes off a little too easily. Had to reapply it a few times over a couple of hours. But it is easily applied and easily removed and a good thickness
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Does not glow in the dark as posted under a search engine
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this item I was under the understanding that it was glow-in-the-dark I'm very upset about this because I put glow-in-the-dark in the search area. I bought other things to go along with it so that I can play around and have fun with my kids and now I can't with this.
customer_reviews.author: jamie mortenson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Do put this on in layers and then put on translucent powder and reply I found this best. Never needed to touch up. Started taking off with baby wipes. The makeup itself is great. Great color great blending. I applied with a makeup sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Suchy

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but I'm allergic
customer_reviews.text: Coverage was so-so, about what I expected for a white face paint. It came off easily enough with makeup remover wipes. Unfortunately, it turned it that I'm allergic to something in the paint, so I had to take it off immediately. I'm not sure how long it lasts or if there's any cracking when it dries
customer_reviews.author: Cia

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: i liked it at first but i don’t know if maybe i just got a bad one but whenever i tried to apply it it would end up being patchy and not rlly covering anything, even when I put powder over it. i tried multiple methods of applying it but it would be the same each time, the only time it worked decently was when i applied it with my finger. overall, not really good.
customer_reviews.author: internetangel

customer_reviews.title: Well. It's blue.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a pretty blue, or a blue that you can apply other makeup over; it's just blue. It does not spread well, it's spotty when dry, even after touching up, it was still .. eh... If you're looking for a pretty, easy to spread, easy to put other makeup over blue, try Mehron face/body paint in the compact (like the powder form; "just add water"), it was much more functional.
customer_reviews.author: M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Meh, its okay
customer_reviews.text: when you put it on, it lasts a good while. I wore it all day on for a halloween party and videos. Lasts okay with sweat. It does require layering if you want that matte look. full face requires a lot and im already only two shades darker than printer paper, so that was a bummer. USE A GENERIC MAKE-UP SPONGE OR BEAUTY BLENDER. If you se your hands it wont go on right and you will look like crap. I got the small tube and only did full face- which is all i used it for- twice, its nearly gone.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat weak
customer_reviews.text: It works but its not nearly as dark as you would hope or as other makeups. You really have to cake it on to actually get it black otherwise it just looks like you were rubbing charcoal on you.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Devo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a costume and didn't need to reapply. A lite goes a long way but takes a little while to dry. Came off with makeup remover wipes but also could be cleaned with soap and warm water. Did not stain skin or clothing.
customer_reviews.author: leeciev

customer_reviews.title: Streaky and opaque
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it dried to a powdery consistency but I didn't like how streaky it was. I tried applying with both a brush and sponge but found that the sponge ended up taking the makeup back off. So now I'm patchy and streaky. It was still opaque but there wasn't anything I could do. It held up ok for 6 hrs but started flaking off after 2 or 3 hours. I dont know if I'm using it right but I wouldnt order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, easy to remove, and multiple applications!
customer_reviews.text: This little tube really does a good job! I applied the green makeup to my entire face, neck, ears, and hands (I was the wicked witch for Halloween this year) three separate times and it did very well. It's easy to apply with just your fingers. Once it dries, it comes off easily with a little soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: clarinetdan

customer_reviews.title: Wore really well ... but the coverage wasn’t stellar.
customer_reviews.text: The coverage of this makeup was less than stellar ... it would have taken many many layers to create a completely white complexion if that’s what I had been going for. It didn’t spread very easily either, making it difficult to apply to large areas. It wore well and lasted well but I don’t recommend it if you’re looking for a “full coverage white out”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It washes off really easy, but at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I used this for halloween this year--I will preface this by saying I don't normally wear ANY makeup, so maybe I was applying it wrong. I had to use a lot to get a consistent color. It washes off really easy, but at the same time, it really pealed off a lot for me. So, again, Not a professional makeup artist, but I probably wouldn't buy it again if I wanted something to last a little longer than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Barb House

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Think it was just toooo old. I put it on my son and within 20 minutes it was dried out and cracking... flaked off of him. It also didn't go on smooth. Junk! The paint in the $5 halloween kit worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Start to flake off as soon as it dries
customer_reviews.text: The color is a dark blue and goes in very easy. It is super easy to clean and get off the skin. However, as soon as it dries it starts to flake off immediately and makes skin look cracked and dry. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, easy to apply, easy to remove with soap
customer_reviews.text: This costume makeup is perfect. It is super easy to apply (I used a concealer makeup brush), it has great coverage, was gentle on my face even around the eye area, and came off easily with soap and water once I was ready to wash off. I haven't used a ton of costume makeup before but I can't imagine there's anything better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Cheddar Goblin costume, and the makeup stayed on great all night! I even put eyelash glue on top of it to glue macaroni to my face. The only gripe i had was that it came off on the brush when I tried to set it with loose powder, but otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great pigment.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for megamind costume. The color was very pigmented and I found that it is best applied with a sponge. It dried down really quickly and was easy to clean and came off with just a makeup wipe and face wash. The only issue was that the color tended to rub off from time to time but that can be avoided by setting it with powder. The other issue was that during application, the paint would come off when I dabbed the same place twice with the sponge which was frustrating. But all in all, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sadiya

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Face Paint
customer_reviews.text: I hated this face paint so much. I tried different tools to apply it (hands, multiple brushes, sponges) but it applies very unevenly and is super patchy. It looks worse the more that you apply. It dries extremely fast so it’s pretty much impossible to blend. I’m definitely returning this because I know for a fact I’ll never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mesode

customer_reviews.title: Terrible- I gave up!
customer_reviews.text: This was terrible. I tried this several times before giving up! I tried using a brush, makeup sponge and my fingers. I appplied a thin layer first, but no matter what I did (e.g. allowing it to dry between coats) it came out splotchy and horrible and parts I already painted came off entirely, leaving skin showing. I am pretty good with make up and painting, and was surprised by the good reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for parties, not for stage
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, I like the texture. I don't like that when it dries it turns flaky, but I only ordered it for a party costume anyway. Might have used it for shows if not for the flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Green Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Great Glow in the Dark Body Paint - Really Glows and Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's glow in the dark slumber party. All her friends loved it and had a ball painting themselves with this. Be aware that it is a small container. Otherwise, great product, really glowed and stayed on for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time working with this, it came off very easily. Even after powdering it, the makeup still came off with the slightest touch from another brush. Does not blend well. I spent twice the amount of time on a client's makeup because of how difficult it was to work with. I suggest purchasing Ben Nye instead, a little goes a long way and it is way easier to work with and blend.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Welp, that was on my face for 6 days.
customer_reviews.text: As advised I heavily moisturized, had a primer, set the paint for a full face green slime look and set it with primer. What I got was a very vibrant pigment, actually completed the slime/melting face look I needed for a costume party..... but I also got to wear a green face for almost a week. Nothing worked: Olive oil, professional make up remover, baking soda and aloe, toner...have I forgotten anything? Heads up for those who are doing a full facepaint.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The tube is relatively small and because I was hoping to practice some looks before Halloween, I was a little let down. Upon opening and testing a TINY drop on my hand I realized that the product was really pigmented and that a little goes a long way. Very easy to manipulate and use. Unfortunately it can be a bit of a pain to remove but as long as you use makeup remover instead of water, it shouldn't take too long.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a joker costume makeup this past Halloween, it lasted all night and hours working in a neighborhood haunted house, through sweat fog and Florida heat it lasted until I washed it off around 3am
customer_reviews.author: Fadden1

customer_reviews.title: Better make up available
customer_reviews.text: Did not go on skin evenly at all. I was disappointed. I tried tbin, thick, with primer and without. I may have used it incorrectly but there were no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome makeup
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this makeup for Halloween based off the reviews. I was not disappointed at all with this purchase. I was worried if I went to heavy with my application it would be difficult to remove. When I was ready to remove it, there was no problem washing it off with water. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It's not great, it's not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I used this as part of a Mardi Gras costume. The coverage was more sheer than anything, although it still looked good. If you're hoping for a true, concentrated metallic look, try another product. Some rub off on clothes, collar, but overall it stayed really well throughout the evening with a lot of hugging, dancing, walking, and sweating.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This product was way worse than the cheap stuff from Walmart. It flaked off before I could even put a second layer on and would not cover evenly. If I hadn’t opened it and trying to get it to cover my body. I bought it in red, blue, white and black. Do not waste your money. It’s very easy to remove. So easy in fact the slightest amount of sweat makes it come off in rivets.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Smooth white texture/coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great white coverage on skin and it lasted a long while. Some lightly rubbed off onto my daughter’s costume. After I read the ingredients I wasn’t so thrilled about using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to get us thru the holidays. Easy to put on & makeup was easy to take off as well. Will buy again when needed
customer_reviews.author: shelly h.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the moonlight white and received the gold which is half the price I paid! I’m extremely upset because I needed them for a photo shoot tomorrow. Definitely returning for my full amount.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a basic face paint, I had to apply 3 coats for the best coverage, it definitly won't last 40 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: This does not spread well at all! I had ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not spread well at all! I had to mix a cheaper silver with it just to get it spread on the skin. I used sponges and tried with brushes
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super pigmented and highly metallic. Doesn't transfer or rub off easily. Added a pic showing it even covers over black tattoo ink since I'll be tracing over them as part of my costume.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Fossum

customer_reviews.title: It clumps amd flakes
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my 3 year old for Halloween and it clumped and flaked in 10 seconds. While I was doing another part of her face the part already on was flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Gilca

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I had minor red rush on my face after using this face paint. The product itself works as described but if you have sensitive skin,I won’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Miiswh

customer_reviews.title: Light grey, No good
customer_reviews.text: Hated the texture, I tried it on on my face and it looked disgusting and Cakey and it didn't blend. This light grey color I got definitely didn't work for me, and it would definitely show on camera. Another color I Tried however looked amazing (red one)
customer_reviews.author: DiablaAndy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality stuff, especially for the price! I did a quick makeup test to make sure I've got what I need for Halloween. The fact that it's cream-based helps it not to flake. The pigmentation makes a little go a long way, especially with darker colors. I also bought the white paint and it's a little more on the transparent side. It'll take an extra layer to get it totally opaque. I'm pretty excited to use this stuff on Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Works as makeup should
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional makeup artist but this worked great for my cosplay. It's creamy and not messy even for an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: CamoCat

customer_reviews.title: Received Hard as a Rock
customer_reviews.text: This product was hard as a rock when it was delivered. Must have been used previously is my guest or not an authentic product. Of course the item is unable to be returned so I am out the money. Next time I will be purchasing from an authentic realtor and not online.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lemanski

customer_reviews.title: Kiss
customer_reviews.text: The whole family wAs kiss for Halloween. This worked great. Nobody broke out or had allergic reaction( kids with sensitive skin) and it lasted all night. Was very easy to wash off. There’s still so much left
customer_reviews.author: Pidge14

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: DISAPPOINTED!!!! I ordered the white and was shipped the glow in the dark. NOT AT ALL WHAT I NEED so this bottle is basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Luke's Music

customer_reviews.title: Flaked off quickly
customer_reviews.text: This makeup was easy to apply and easy to remove. But after about 2 hours off wearing it, it started to flake off and little bits of white makeup was everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Not much more to say. Was worried it would run, but it sets up pretty good. Was easy to take off in the shower with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: C T.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't bad for the price I give it 3⭐
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth great quality paint just not as long lasting as expecting. Good paint for Halloween costume. I'm 5'2 and only needed one bottle I ordered 2 just in case. If you want full coverage definitely order yourself two or one more than expected if you're taller than me. My boyfriend did his face with the pallet lasted him all night
customer_reviews.author: 𝓴𝓪𝓽𝓮

customer_reviews.title: perfect for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: with halloween right around the corner these are great for anyone & everyone. Kids, adults, basic costumes to over the top! these tubes are all set to go, no need to add water or set, they will dry on their own! you can mix them easily to create custom colors are well!
customer_reviews.author: Split_Personalityyy

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: This was way too watery and didn't hold up well throughout the evening. I had to layer it on thick and even then it didn't come out as white as I would have wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful white with some gray-doesn’t come off as a clown or too stark. Will be perfect for Beetle juice. Cleans up with water. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for costume
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for Dia De Los Muertos costume! Stayed on all night, washed off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i was annoyed to find a $7 price tag on it while i spent way more. plus its so so small and seemed to the thicker than the ones i have bought on face painting websites.
customer_reviews.author: eniyanselvan

customer_reviews.title: Uneven application
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in two colors to confirm whether I can use it for my Halloween makeup. I applied it with a sponge, and the paint did not spread evenly. It looked patchy, and this color did not completely cover my face. The more I reapplied, the more it rubbed off.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: This make up was not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The make up arrived on time but it doesn’t stay on my face. I couldn’t blend it very well with the green color and it wiped off very easily. I tried to use powder to protect it but it made it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Bradleyville

customer_reviews.title: It cracks
customer_reviews.text: Goes on great, looks, good unless you move or speak... after it's completely dry it starts to crack and flakes off eventually.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend buying, solid brand
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a halloween face paint look underneath a clear platinum silicone mask. Although I did get a little sweaty underneath the mask, the paint (for the most part) stayed intact. Easy to apply, did not affect my skin in any negative way, & enjoyed the quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Castle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my “Wicked Witch of the West” makeup for Halloween. I did wind up mixing it with a little black to make it match better. But overall, loved it! I loved how well it covered, how pigmented it was, how long it lasted, how relatively easy it was to come off (don’t bother with makeup wipes, just get in the shower) and how it smelled (it had a sweet-ish aroma/didn’t stink).
customer_reviews.author: Krysta Lynn Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT glow in the dark, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT glow in the dark at all. Left the tube directly under a lamp for a few hours, putbit on in a bright light, and NOTHING! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crazygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Not very thick
customer_reviews.text: Easy to ttake off because it doesn't go on very thick. Couldn't get the face all the way white. But I used it for joker makeup so it worked for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Lula May

customer_reviews.title: Nope. No no. Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT blend well at all and once it dried, would become cakey and flakey like you have dry skin. I tried "layering" it on for that pure white look and it only rubbed the bottom layer off. Nope. No no. Don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Mehron Makeup Fantasy F/X Water Based Face & Body Paint (1 oz) (White)
feature_bullets: Water-based, highly pigmented soft cream makeup
Great for all varieties of face painting applications
Apply with sponge, brush or fingertips to skin or hair
Proudly Made in the USA since 1927

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
